alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 9:32PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ MONDAY TO 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Marshall, Northern La Porte, Northern Kosciusko and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ Monday to 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel conditions will deteriorate beginning Monday morning. Strong wind gusts with falling snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning, but especially the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
